00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine  : Init
00003 ! Revision    : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author      : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 
00015 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00020 ! MP-LABS is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the

00029 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE Init
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, m, xs, ys
00042  INTEGER :: ie, iw, jn, js
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: R, rhon, phin, muPhi, lapPhi
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Af0, Af1
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ag0, Ag1, Eg1A, Eg2A
00046 
00047 
00048 ! Initialize counters
00049  now   = 0
00050  nxt   = 1
00051  iStep = 0
00052  tCall = 1
00053  eps   = 1.D0
00054 
00055 ! Set vtk limits
00056  NX   = xu   - xl   + 1
00057  NY   = yu   - yl   + 1
00058  NX_f = xu_f - xl_f + 1
00059  NY_f = yu_f - yl_f + 1
00060 
00061 ! Set initial "density"
00062  rhon = 0.5D0*(rhoH + rhoL)
00063 
00064 !--------- Initialize the order parameter values -------------------------------
00065  DO j = ylg_f, yug_f
00066    DO i = xlg_f, xug_f
00067 
00068       phi_f(i,j) = -phistar
00069       DO m = 1, nBubbles
00070         R =  DSQRT( (DBLE(i)-bubbles(m,1))**2 + (DBLE(j)-bubbles(m,2))**2 )
00071         IF ( R <= (DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) + IntWidth) ) THEN
00072           phi_f(i,j) = phistar*TANH( 2.D0*( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) - R )/IntWidth )
00073         END IF
00074       END DO
00075 
00076     END DO
00077  END DO
00078 
00079 !--------- Define near-neighbors in the order parameter mesh -------------------
00080  DO j = ylg_f, yug_f
00081    DO i = xlg_f, xug_f
00082       ni_f(i,j,1) = i + 1
00083       ni_f(i,j,2) = j + 1
00084       ni_f(i,j,3) = i - 1
00085       ni_f(i,j,4) = j - 1
00086    END DO
00087  END DO
00088 
00089 
00090 !---------- Initialize the order parameter distribution function ---------------
00091  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00092    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00093 
00094 ! Local value of the order parameter
00095      phin  = phi_f(i,j)
00096 
00097 ! Identify neighbors
00098      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00099      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00100      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00101      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00102 
00103 ! laplacina of the order parameter
00104      lapPhi_f(i,j) = ( phi_f(ie,jn) + phi_f(ie,js) + phi_f(iw,jn)    &
00105                    + phi_f(iw,js) + 4.D0*( phi_f(ie,j) + phi_f(iw,j) &
00106                    + phi_f(i,jn) + phi_f(i,js) ) - 20.D0*phin )*inv6
00107 
00108 ! Chemical potential
00109      muPhi = alpha4*phin*( phin*phin - phistar2 ) - kappa*lapPhi_f(i,j)
00110 
00111 ! Equilibrium coefficients
00112      Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muPhi
00113      Af0 = -2.D0*Gamma*muPhi
00114 
00115 ! Equilibrium distribution for zero initial velocity
00116      f(i,j,0)   = Af0 + phin
00117      f(i,j,1:4) = Af1
00118 
00119    END DO
00120  END DO
00121 
00122 
00123 !---------- Define near neighbours in the momentum mesh ------------------------
00124  DO j = ylg, yug
00125    DO i = xlg, xug
00126       ni(i,j,1) = i + 1
00127       ni(i,j,2) = j + 1
00128       ni(i,j,3) = i - 1
00129       ni(i,j,4) = j - 1
00130    END DO
00131  END DO
00132 
00133 !--------- Initialize the momentum distribution function -----------------------
00134  DO j = yl, yu
00135    DO i = xl, xu
00136 
00137 ! Define source nodes in the order parameter mesh
00138      xs = 2*i - 1
00139      ys = 2*j - 1
00140 
00141 ! Local values of the phase and the chemical potential
00142      phin   = phi_f(xs,ys)
00143      lapPhi = 4.D0*lapPhi_f(xs,ys)
00144      muPhi  = alpha4*phin*( phin*phin - phistar2 ) - kappaG*lapPhi
00145 
00146 ! Coefficients
00147       Ag1  = rhon + 3.D0*phin*muPhi
00148       Ag0  = 2.25D0*rhon - 1.25D0*Ag1
00149       Eg1A = Eg1*Ag1
00150       Eg2A = Eg2*Ag1
00151 
00152 ! Equilibrium distribution for zero initial velocity
00153       g(i,j,0,now)   = Eg0*Ag0
00154       g(i,j,1:4,now) = Eg1A
00155       g(i,j,5:8,now) = Eg2A
00156 
00157    END DO
00158  END DO
00159 
00160 ! Calculate differential terms needed in collision step
00161  CALL Differentials
00162 
00163 ! Save initialized data
00164  CALL Stats
00165  CALL VtkPlane
00166 
00167  RETURN
00168  END SUBROUTINE Init
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:56 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
